typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as short,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(equals(department, 1),
	equals(department, 2),
	equals(department, 3),
	equals(department, 4),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ITEmployees, HR, Fianance, securuty, Otheremployee)
ConditionalSplit1@ITEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['IT.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@HR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HR.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@Fianance sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Fina.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink3
ConditionalSplit1@securuty sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Sec.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink4
